name: Jatin Sood
bio: I am a passionate Electronics and Communication Engineering student at NIT Hamirpur. I have a keen interest in technology and enjoy working on innovative projects.

projects.title: Robotics using Arduino
projects.description: A project focused on building and programming robots using Arduino technology.

projects.title: Basic Signal Processing using MATLAB
projects.description: An exploration of signal processing techniques using MATLAB.

projects.title: IoT-based Home Automation
projects.description: A project that integrates Internet of Things (IoT) technology for automating home systems.
